table.name: gtm_structure_component
table.description: Trade Item Structure Component captures the component (quantity and % on item value) details of a trade item structure.

columns.name: GTM_STRUCTURE_GID
columns.description: GTM_STRUCTURE_GID contains the unique identifier for the trade item structure.

columns.name: GTM_STRUCTURE_COMPONENT_SEQ
columns.description: Trade Item Structure Component Sequence Number

columns.name: ITEM_GID
columns.description: Component Identification ID. Component can be identified either by Trade Item ID or by Product Classification Code

columns.name: DESCRIPTION
columns.description: Component Description

columns.name: GTM_PROD_CLASS_CODE_GID
columns.description: Component Identification ID. Component can be identified either by Trade Item ID or by Product Classification Code

columns.name: COUNTRY_OF_ORIGIN
columns.description: Components country of origin

columns.name: INVENTORY_ORGANIZATION_GID
columns.description: Identifies the inventory organization corresponding to the item structure component.

columns.name: PARTNER_GID
columns.description: Identifies the partner corresponding to the item structure component.

columns.name: PARTNER_SITE_GID
columns.description: Identifies the partner site corresponding to the item structure component.
